item.title: VSCode+Python+Appium安装及简单示例
item.description: 首先完成安装的准备工作 Getting Started with Python in VS Code 安装Appium Getting Started - Appium npm install -g appium 安装特定的驱动 Requirements: Java8正确安装 接下来，安装The UiAutomator2 Driver (for Android apps) 配置PATH 配置JA
